name: Bowl Movement Constraint
message: Bowl must move right when right arrow key is pressed.

name: Bowl Movement Details Constraint
message: Bowl must move right with a speed of 10 when right arrow key is pressed.

name: Apple Spawn Random X Position Constraint
Banana Spawn Random X Position Constraint
Banana Bowl Points Constraint
message: Bananas must give 8 points when they hit the bowl.

name: Banana Ground Points Constraint
message: Bananas must subtract 8 points when they hit the floor.

name: Banana Ground Message Constraint
message: Banana must display a message when it hits the ground.
